attributes.action: Have Tumblr site policed or removed to prevent children with eating disorders and/or self harm problems using it to post
attributes.additional_details: Websites such as Tumblr are being used by our young teenagers with mental health problems/eating disorders and that self harm.  Pictures are being reposted by these youngsters to show others what they do.  This is a danger to our teenagers, as they are not policed.  This needs correcting to have this type of information removed from blog sites or have them shut down completely. This type of blog site needs policing or removing if they do not take action

rejection.details: This is a matter for Tumblr administrators.
